name: Fundraising Matching + Advisor
description: Two components: (1) Investor Matching card — 3 placement/treatment options (in-grid action, inline row, contextual/adaptive), (2) AI Advisor button — 3 styles using Weftly W mark (outline pill, compact pill, icon-only circle)
prompt: /prototype 'Investor Matching card + AI Advisor button' --fidelity concept --chrome sidebar --options 3 --name fundraising-matching-advisor

versions.notes: Option A: Matching stays IN the 4-column stats grid with dashed border + icon container + primary CTA. Advisor: outline pill with W mark + label.
Option B: Matching pulled OUT of grid into a separate inline action row between stats and tabs. Stats go to clean 3-column. Advisor: compact pill with tight padding and border-default.
Option C: Contextual/adaptive — prominent callout when <5 investors, subtle pill near segment tabs when 5+. Advisor: W mark only as icon button with tooltip.
5 Advisor button variations side-by-side: V1 compact pill 18px, V2 icon-only circle 20px, V3 ghost 14px, V4 outline pill with ⌘J shortcut 16px, V5 'Ask' verb-first with trailing W mark 18px
